https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hplyNVyHJDnIOPk7qpqYXVpHcU5.jpg News that the school is supposed to suddenly close causes great agitation among the students. They decide to take direct action by occupying their school... The siege commands hard-action from the friends to protect their school and identities. Will they convince the board to keep the school open? Best Friends – The Movie
